title: NEON TOKYO BUBBLE CAFÉ
description: Economic excess meets aesthetic perfection. Where city pop meets future funk, salary men dance in mirror ball offices, and every coin drop sounds like money. Welcome to 1980s Japan, where tomorrow was always just one more yen away.

city_pop.title: CITY POP CLASSICS
city_pop.description: Smooth Urban Sophistication - Yacht rock meets Tokyo nightlife

midnight_cruising.title: Midnight Cruising
midnight_cruising.description: Smooth urban sophistication with saxophone solos and electric pianos. Honda Civic meets disco ball in the best possible way. These tracks capture that perfect moment when Japanese pop learned to swing with American soul.
midnight_cruising.samples: "Plastic Love" by Mariya Takeuchi, "4:00AM" by Taeko Onuki, "Stay With Me" by Miki Matsubara, "Sparkle" by Tatsuro Yamashita

neon_nights.title: Neon Nights
neon_nights.description: Late-night Tokyo vibes with synthesized perfection. Every street corner has a vending machine and every vending machine plays the perfect song. Music for walking through Shibuya at 2 AM when the city never sleeps.
neon_nights.samples: "Magic Ways" by Tatsuro Yamashita, "Sweetest Music" by Seiko Matsuda, "Bay City" by Junko Yagami, "Telephone Number" by Junko Ohashi

shibuya_crossing.title: Shibuya Crossing
shibuya_crossing.description: Rush hour sophistication with pedestrian perfection. When commuting becomes choreography and every step is in rhythm. These tracks capture that beautiful chaos of Tokyo life where millions of people somehow move in perfect harmony.
shibuya_crossing.samples: "For You" by Tatsuro Yamashita, "Ride on Time" by Tatsuro Yamashita, "Love Talkin'" by Toshiki Kadomatsu, "Timely!!" by Anri

future_funk.title: FUTURE FUNK ARCADE
future_funk.description: Vaporwave's Energetic Cousin - Chopped and screwed disco meets anime aesthetics

pachinko_paradise.title: Pachinko Paradise
pachinko_paradise.description: Hyper-filtered disco samples meets arcade culture. Every ball drop is a beat drop. These tracks understand that the future was supposed to be more colorful and the past was always more funky than we remembered.
pachinko_paradise.samples: "Night Tempo" by Night Tempo, "Desired" by Desired, "Macross 82-99" by Macross 82-99, "Yung Bae" by Yung Bae

vaporwave_velocity.title: Vaporwave Velocity
vaporwave_velocity.description: Nostalgic acceleration through digital dreamscapes. When the past becomes the future and the future sounds like a slowed-down commercial from 1987. These tracks prove that sometimes the best way forward is sideways through time.
vaporwave_velocity.samples: "Saint Pepsi" by Saint Pepsi, "Flamingo Funk" by Yung Bae, "Selfish High Heels" by Yung Bae, "Something About You" by Macross 82-99

arcade_cabinet.title: Arcade Cabinet Dreams
arcade_cabinet.description: Quarter-slot philosophy with pixel-perfect beats. When video games become lifestyle and lifestyle becomes performance art. Music for those who measure time in high scores and space in screen pixels.
arcade_cabinet.samples: "Night Cruising" by Desired, "Computer Love" by Desired, "Timeless" by Night Tempo, "Your Eyes" by Night Tempo

economic_bubble.title: ECONOMIC BUBBLE LOUNGE
economic_bubble.description: Excess and Optimism - When Japan thought it owned the future

salary_man_swagger.title: Salary Man Swagger
salary_man_swagger.description: Corporate confidence with jazz fusion sophistication. Every Honda is a Lamborghini and every office building reaches toward tomorrow. Music for when the economy was so good it felt like cheating.
salary_man_swagger.samples: "Breezin'" by George Benson, "Morning Dance" by Spyro Gyra, "Feels So Good" by Chuck Mangione, "Countdown" by Jupiter

real_estate_fantasy.title: Real Estate Fantasy
real_estate_fantasy.description: Property speculation with architectural appreciation. When every building is an investment and every investment is a building. These tracks capture that beautiful moment when money grew on concrete trees.
real_estate_fantasy.samples: "Money for Nothing" by Dire Straits, "Private Dancer" by Tina Turner, "What's Love Got to Do with It" by Tina Turner, "We Don't Need Another Hero" by Tina Turner

nikkei_rising.title: Nikkei Rising
nikkei_rising.description: Stock market symphonies with yen-denominated dreams. When every number goes up and every investment seems golden. Music for those who thought the party would never end and almost made it work.
nikkei_rising.samples: "Owner of a Lonely Heart" by Yes, "Blue Monday" by New Order, "Sweet Dreams" by Eurythmics, "Tainted Love" by Soft Cell

anime_aesthetics.title: ANIME AESTHETIC LOUNGE
anime_aesthetics.description: Kawaii Future Pop - When Japan exported dreams in cel animation and vinyl

sailor_moon.title: Sailor Moon Cocktail
sailor_moon.description: Magical girl energy with cosmic disco vibes. Fighting evil by moonlight, winning love by daylight, and looking fabulous while doing both. These tracks understand that saving the world should always have the perfect soundtrack.
sailor_moon.samples: "Moonlight Densetsu" by DALI, "Heart Moving" by Misae Takamatsu, "Princess Moon" by Ushio Hashimoto, "Tuxedo Mirage" by Peach Hips

bubble_economy.title: Bubble Economy Dreams
bubble_economy.description: When money grew on trees and every investment was golden. Optimistic excess with synthesized perfection. These songs capture that beautiful moment when Japan's future looked infinite and every salary man felt like a millionaire.
bubble_economy.samples: "Timely!!" by Anri, "Windy Summer" by Kingo Hamada, "Dancing All Night" by Miki Matsubara, "Weekend" by Schole

kawaii_future.title: Kawaii Future Bass
kawaii_future.description: Cute meets cutting-edge in neon-soaked perfection. Hello Kitty with synthesizers, Pokémon with perfect production values. These tracks represent Japan's gift to the world: making the future adorable.
kawaii_future.samples: "Cruel Angel's Thesis" by Yoko Takahashi, "Tank!" by The Seatbelts, "Inner Universe" by Origa, "Rise" by Gabriela Robin
